text:
@GOPChairwoman @realDonaldTrump What your bringing is a mass infection event. Im two counties away. Ate out Saturday but thanks to @potus insatiable ego, #Florida will see even bigger spike. No more dining out.

#StayAtHome #COVID19 #BlueWave2020 #FlipTheSenate @JoeBiden #JoeBiden2020
